casebody.data:
Pearce v. Pullen, administratrix. May 15, 1895.

Brought forward from the last term.

Action on notes. Before Judge Harris. Carroll superior court. October term, 1898. C. P. Gordon and Adamson & Jackson, for plaintiff. W. D. Hamrick and W. P. Brown, for defendant. Atkinson, J.

This case falls within the general rule that the discretion of a trial judge in the general grant of a first new trial will not be disturbed by this court. • Judgment affirmed.
